If you would like to retire a soldier, make sure to select 'Honorable Retirement' from the 'Grade' dropdown menu. This will move the soldier to the 'Retired' combat unit and preserve their personnel file. All other discharge grades will delete their personnel file.

All awards and commendation images should be placed in the following folder: {$this->settings['board_url']}/images/perscom/medals/medal_ribbon/
All rank images should be placed in the following folder: {$this->settings['board_url']}/images/perscom/insignia/large/multicam_background/
All administrative unit images should be placed in the following folder: {$this->settings['board_url']}/images/perscom/units/admin/
All weapon images should be placed in the following folder: {$this->settings['board_url']}/images/perscom/weapons/

You successfully saved the weapon.

Assignment to a combat unit is a duty that comes with many responsibilities. The soldiers serving alongside you count on you to fulfill your obligations. Fulfillment of your obligations and responsibilities entails that you notify the unit of upcoming absences and request a leave of absence in advance; that you will serve as a committed soldier in combat operations; that you will respect the chain of command; that you will carry out your mission first and foremost and consider yourself and your statistics last; and that you not only reflect well on your combat unit, but on the {$this->settings['board_name']} as a whole. Much is expected from you, but we are confident that you will exceed those expectations.
You are have received a non-punitive demotion and are hereby demoted to the rank of %s.
For failure to uphold the seven Army core values and negligence of your duties, you are hereby demoted to the rank of %s.

The Secretary of the Army has reposed special trust and confidence in your patriotism, valor, fidelity and professional excellence. In view of these qualities and your demonstrated leadership potential and dedicated service to the United States Army and the unit, you are, therefore, awarded the %s.

The Secretary of the Army has reposed special trust and confidence in your patriotism, valor, fidelity and professional excellence. In view of these qualities and your demonstrated leadership potential and dedicated service to the United States Army and the unit, you are, therefore, promoted to the rank of %s.

Before applying with the {$this->settings['board_name']}, please read over the following enlistment requirements. If you do not meet the current requirements, please contact a recruiter and we would be more than happy to assist you in any way we can. You MUST meet the following requirements to be considered for enlistment. Failure to meet the basic requirements will result in your application being dropped. Thank you for the understanding and good luck!
Thank you for applying with the {$this->settings['board_name']}. Please fill out all required fields. Failure to do so will result in termination of your application.
Commitment Time
Provide two reasons why you would like to join this unit.
How did you hear about us?
Thank You

By submitting your application, you understand that the {$this->settings['board_name']} is a military based realism unit. You will be expected to act responsible and behave in proper fashion and that failure to do so will result in disciplinary action. The {$this->settings['board_name']} is based on the core values of the US Army and therefore models a rank structure similiar to that of the US Army. You will be expected to abide by the chain of command and act appropriately among unit members. The {$this->settings['board_name']} is a fun and exciting unit, but only because our members understand the true values set forth by the US Army and practice them daily within the unit.

Your application has been successfully submitted and posted in our Candidate Files section of our forums. You may visit the Candidate Files at anytime to check up on the status of your application. Please do not hesitate to contact your recruiter with any questions.

A new enlistment application has been posted to the Candidate Files. Head on over to process the application here: %s

Hi %s,

 

Thank you for applying for enlistment with the {$this->settings['board_name']}. Your application has successfully submitted to our Candidate Files section of our forums and is under review. You have been added to our "Enlistees" group and may view the application status at any time. Please visit our forums and scroll down to Candidate Files to view your current application status.

 

Sincerely,

 

The {$this->settings['board_name']}

You have been promoted to the rank of %s. Congratulations. Please understand your new login name is: %s. Your personnel file has been updated and you are good to go! Make sure to request a uniform update to reflect your new rank. Hooah Soldier!
Your discharge has been successfully submitted. When command staff approves the discharge, you will receive another push notification with the update.

Hi %s,

 

Congratulations on your enlistment with the {$this->settings['board_name']}. Below is some information that will be helpful as you begin your journey within the unit. If at any time you have a question, please contact your recruiter immediately!

 

Information:

 

Rank: %s

 

Combat Unit: %s

 

Combat Position: %s

 

Supervisor: %s

 

Recruiter: %s

 

Keep this information for your records.

You have been %s to %s with combat position: %s. Congratulations. Your personnel file has been updated and you are good to go! Make sure to request a uniform update to reflect your new assignment. Hooah Soldier!

Your enlistment application has been dropped. This is because you either requested the drop or we are waiting on a response from you and we have not heard back. Please contact your recruiter if you would like more information or if you are unsure on why this happened.
Notify me on PERSCOM updates and information.
Your enlistment application has been denied. Please contact your recruiter for further information regarding the reasoning behind the decision.
You have been awarded the %s. Congratulations. Your personnel file has been updated and you are good to go! Make sure to request a uniform update to reflect your new award. Hooah Soldier!
Notify me when I muster in.

You have been demoted to the rank of %s. This is a punitive demotion. Please contact a member of Command Staff if you would like more information. Please understand your new login name is: %s. Your personnel file has been updated and you are good to go. Make sure to request a uniform update to reflect your new rank.

You have been honorably retired from the {$this->settings['board_name']}. Thank you for your time and service. We wish you the best on your future endevaours and adventures. Please note, your new login name is now: %s. God speed and God bless! Hooah Soldier!
Your leave of absence has been successfully approved. See you when you get back!
Your discharge has been processed and you have been discharged from the {$this->settings['board_name']}. Grade: %s. Your new login name is: %s. Thank you for your time and service.

You have been demoted to the rank of %s. This is a non-punitive demotion. Please contact a member of Command Staff if you would like more information. Please understand your new login name is: %s. Your personnel file has been updated and you are good to go. Make sure to request a uniform update to reflect your new rank.
You have officially mustered in. Thank you and enjoy the rest of your day!
Your discharge has been approved. You will receive another notification when your discharge has been processed.
Your leave of absence has been denied. Please contact a member of Command Staff for more information.
Your leave of absence has been successfully submitted. When command staff approves the LOA, you will receive another push notification with the update.
Your leave of absence has been dropped.
Your discharge has been denied. Please contact a member of Command Staff for more information.
Your discharge has been dropped.

You have successfully returned from LOA. Please contact your immediate supervisor and inform them of your current status.
%s has requested a leave of absence for %s through %s. It is currently awaiting approval from Command Staff. Explanation: %s

Your enlistment application has been officially processed and you are now a member of the {$this->settings['board_name']}. You have been added to the unit\'s usergroup and you now have access to all unit functions. If you have any questions, please contact your recruiter. You will receive a PM as well with all information needed to continue your enlistment journey. Your new login name is: %s. Hooah solider and welcome to the unit!
